abstract: Simon Thorup Kjær (pronounced [kʰæːɐ̯]; born 26 March 1989) is a Danish professional football player, who plays as a centre back for Lille in the French Ligue 1, and the Danish national team.He was named 2007 Danish under-19 talent of the year and 2009 Danish Talent of the Year. Kjær has played over 30 games for Denmark, including at the 2010 FIFA World Cup and UEFA Euro 2012.
